description: This Interim course introduces students to the rewards and challenges of public and local history.
As the title suggests, we will learn not only by studying but also by doing public history. Focusing
on Northfield and Rice County at the beginning of the 20th century, we will work with the local and
state historical organizations to develop materials for the wider public, including possibly a
display, educational resources, and articles. We also will work to place these local histories in
broader contexts, by studying migration and immigration, the history of childhood and schools,
